channel.title: [PI]How to change the sell of an item?
channel.description: I know how to change the price in the shop, but I want to know how to change the sell only. Like, you buy Chisel for 14 gp and sell it for 5.

I know how to change the price in the shop, but I want to know how to change the sell only. Like, you buy Chisel for 14 gp and sell it for 5.
